item.title: Jack Wolfskin Men’s Gecko Fleece Pullover
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Hoodies - Produced using Belcoro yarn for a softer feel and cleaner printing process, this hoodie is a nice and soft product which can be embroidered with your company’s logo.
item.content:encoded:
Hoodies – Produced using Belcoro yarn for a softer feel and cleaner printing process, this hoodie is a nice and soft product which can be embroidered with your company’s logo. Goes as double fabric hood with self-coloured drawcord, front pouch pocket, ribbed hem and cuffs. Set in sleeves. Twin needle stitching detail to armholes, hems and cuffs.

  • These quality hooded sweatshirts are 90/10 cotton/polyester – soft & durable to keep you warm and comfortable. Features kangaroo pocket & stretch ribbed cuffs & waist
  • Fit is unisex standard (size up in doubt)
  • Machine wash cold inside out with like colors. Tumble dry low
  • Graphic designs are professionally printed. Your unique design will make everyone smile
